name: Family Business (itch) (Eskimo, João Martins)
description:
Family Business is a small simulation game made for the Untitled Game Jam #9 (https://itch.io/jam/untitled-game-jam-9 )

The player must harvest bodies from graves, take them to the shop, and but them in pieces. Customers will come and will want to buy a specific part.

The game is not complete by any meanings. Missing a lot of animations, as well as major UI and UX stuff.

Controls:

  • Left Mouse Click to move and interact
  • "E" or Left Mouse Click in objects to dig or cut.

Made by:

  • Diogo Ferreira : Main Gameplay Programmer
  • João Martins : UI Programmer & Second Gameplay Programmer
  • Rafael Marques : 2D Artist
